extendedInfo.description: ** For the Samsung Galaxy S3 only **This app is a simple shortcut to the Task Manager app found on the Samsung Galaxy S3.It allows you to access the Task Manager more easily through the app drawer or the homescreen without having to long-press the home button.The shortcut created is called "Task Manager".NOTE: The shortcut will work ONLY on the Samsung Galaxy S3.You can also find a shortcut app for the Weather app. (search for Galaxy S3 Weather Shortcut)For more info or support feel free to contact us at support (at) droidahead (dot) comgalaxy s3 s 3 galaxy siii s iii task manager shortcut application

reviews.title: Works on my Galaxy S3 mini
reviews.comment: At first i downloaded this app because i thought my phone is the \'Mini\' of S3 and not sure it would work. BUT guess what??? It works on my Galaxy S3 mini too!!! I guess galaxy S3 mini is the real little brother of Galaxy S3 : )
reviews.author: Johnny Hugh

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: After I updated to official s2 jb only I found out that Samsung developer left this apps shortcut out.. so this apps help a lot.. thanks
reviews.author: Richard Goh

reviews.title: SGSIII
reviews.comment: It\'s just what I needed to keep the processing level in check without exhausting the integrity of the dedicated home button.  Outstanding work! .; )
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works fine 4 GS2 w/JB update!
reviews.comment: This shortcut disappeared completely from my tMo GS2 when I updated the firmware to JellyBean. This works perfectly on my phone, despite the description!
reviews.author: Eric Schrock

reviews.title: Excellent (Galaxy Note 2)
reviews.comment: I was using this on my Galaxy S3 to help with battery life I switched to a note 2 and decided to give it a try and it works perfect on the Galaxy Note 2
reviews.author: Izzy Rodriguez

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried all the other task killers but the one from Samsung simply takes the cake.  Must have on ur phone (should have already came with the phone... Jus sayin)!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works on S4!!! Whoot!!
reviews.comment: Downloaded this for my S4 thinking if it didn\'t work I would just uninstall... but lucky me, it works!! Enjoy S4 users!! Thanks!!
reviews.author: Rachael Rinehart

reviews.title: Perfect on Note II
reviews.comment: I have been looking for a quick shortcut to the task manager, I highly suggest the dev adds the Note II to the description! Thank you
reviews.author: C Sweatt

reviews.title: GEO DEV TEAM
reviews.comment: Works on Galaxy Grand!  Supported for android 4.0+
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked for while
reviews.comment: Now in the unistall area it does not respond unless you wait a couple minutes and u can not switch between ram and storage please fix this issue in the next update thanks
reviews.author: James Willie

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Thank you so much for this! After upgrading to the S3 from the Epic 4G I was missing my shortcut to the task killer. Samsung should automatically have this in the phone when purchased.
reviews.author: Lynn Orange

reviews.title: Great app!  Thanks.
reviews.comment: This app does what\'s said.  For all those who are curious about this app running in background,  it doesn\'t. I saw that once you open the real task manager,  this app shortcut will be closed soon as you get to the t.manager. I don\'t know why the dudes from samsung didn\'t include this simple shortcut on the new JB 4.1.2 update.  Anyways..kudos to the devz.  Peace out.
reviews.author: Dmitri Petrenkov

reviews.title: I rather have this in
reviews.comment: my phone than useless Verizon things which occupies my phone & snoop.
reviews.author: Stacy lynn

reviews.title: Does a task killer really work?
reviews.comment: Yes the shortcut works, but the question is, does this really close running apps, which constantly close & re-open again? Ultimately affecting this phone\'s over all performance... i am tired of regularly clearing out RAM.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works on galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Awesome! I used it on my s3 and just tried it on my new s4 and it works!!! Keep up the good work
reviews.author: Randika Peiris

reviews.title: Concerned
reviews.comment: Is it constantly running? (Draining battery).   Everytime I went to it it appeared it was running and needed to be closed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works on All Jelly Bean!
reviews.comment: This not only works on galaxy S3, but works in all Jelly Bean and ICS phone coz the Task Manager icon was removed from them and this app fill the gap, Thanks.
reviews.author: kalyan dey

reviews.title: Works with s4
reviews.comment: Yea it\'s a shortcut, would prefer the actual widget if you could add a widget option would be 5 stars!
reviews.author: Alex Baxter

reviews.title: Works with GS2 JB
reviews.comment: works great on my TMO GS2 rocking official 4.1.2 Jelly Bean. The update removed task manager widget so I needed this! Thanks!
reviews.author: Kwangpil Jeong

reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
reviews.comment: Works on my s3 mini however I have found the program is already installed and can be found by long pressing the home button and the shortcut will be displayed on the bottom left of the screen.
reviews.author: Robert Davis
